Articles.Content: I have had 101 great ideas for spacecraft recently that had hinged panels on. Trouble is Damned Robotics is on the back burner for 0.20 update right now. Does anyone have an alternative. All I want is a hinge with a control that allows you to fold an unfold it ala DR. Fixed 90-degree and 45-degree ones would be a good start but ultimately i'd like to be able to set them to any angle in a 180-degree arc so I can make ramps, folding solar arrays, pods etc. Any ideas?

Articulation is a big thing that people have been clamouring for for a while, it's certainly on my list of cool things to get (along with updated Aero!). I think that Squad are planning something in the future, and given that Romfarer is part of the modding team and he worked on a Canadarm equivalent in one of his mods, it will certainly be something they're looking into (cause all the cool stuff in space comes from manipulation!).

There was a fix in the Damned Robotics thread.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/9675-v0-19-Damned-Robotics-Version-1-3?p=428734&viewfull=1#post428734
